BH/BLASTRAGE



BH goes to the control room. He checks all of his wepons to make sure 
the were still funtional. He pulled out a cloth and wiped of the 
mechfluid from his sword. He went to the com consol and called for 
BLASTRAGE. He then got some cleaning robots to clean up the mess,
from 
the fight, as he waited for BLASTRAGE. BLASTRAGE walked in and looked 
at BH then at the robots.

BH said to BLASTRAGE "TAKEDOWN betrayed us. He killed KILLERBOT so I 
had to kill him."

BLASTRAGE mouth dropped open. He couldn't believe it. "BH, go to the 
CR Chamber and heal yourself while I run the ship."

BH got up from his chair and started heading for the CR Chamber. He 
turns around and looks at BLASTRAGE. "If you need their dead bodies 
they are in the Brig. Good luck." BH Steps into the cr chamber.
